title: Aadhya Emerald and Diamond Gold Necklace
materials: Natural Emeralds (Zambian Origin). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: The necklace showcases a contemporary take on the classic Addigai design. It features a beautifully structured gold framework interspersed with emeralds and diamond floral motifs. The pendant, a captivating blend of traditional South Indian design with modern flair, boasts a larger emerald centerpiece surrounded by intricate diamond settings and delicate gold bead drops. The filigree detailing adds a touch of timeless elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: or a sophisticated evening event. It's a stunning choice for a modern bride or anyone looking to add a touch of South Indian elegance to their wardrobe.
description: This necklace is a unique fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of high-quality Zambian emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds ensures exceptional brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting shine and durability. The design is versatile enough to complement both traditional Indian attire and modern outfits.
